I also did not share all my dx with the public just to protect my energy level and since bc my eneregy /stress level needs lots of protection. Good vibes to all.
Posts.Title: How do people deal with the fear? Lesley1 mthomp2020

Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2008 01:06PM Bancroft wrote: I love your strength and honesty...the puking part is so real....keep being you and know we all care and are here..... hate this disease for making mothers cry and daughters to ask why they are getting the shitty lottery...hate this disease for making us cry until we puke ...hate this disease for our fears of evry pain is cancer and worrying that we are going to leave our babies motherless and hate this disease so f***ing much that strong, good beautiful women don't win....that I just don't know what to do.....
